(Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 3.)

Name: Flow Flight 2
Description: If unit initiates combat and unit's HP ≥ 50% at start of combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, deals damage during combat = 50% of difference between Def stats (unit's Def minus foe's Def) and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 50% of that difference. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 5.)

Name: Flow Flight 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, deals damage during combat = 70% of difference between Def stats (unit's Def minus foe's Def) and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 70% of that difference. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 7.)

Name: Flow Feather 1
Description: If unit initiates combat and unit's HP = 100% at start of combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, deals damage during combat = 30% of difference between Res stats (unit's Res minus foe's Res) and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 30% of that difference. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 3.)

Name: Flow Feather 2
Description: If unit initiates combat and unit's HP ≥ 50% at start of combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, deals damage during combat = 50% of difference between Res stats (unit's Res minus foe's Res) and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 50% of that difference. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 5.)

Name: Flow Feather 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, deals damage during combat = 70% of difference between Res stats (unit's Res minus foe's Res) and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 70% of that difference. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials. Min: 0, max: 7.)

Name: Flow Force 1
Description: At the start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

Name: Flow Force 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

Name: Flow Force 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

Name: Assault Force
Description: If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, neutralizes penalties on unit, deals damage = 20% of the greater of unit's Spd or Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Flow N Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. At the start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

Name: Flow N Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. At the start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

Name: Flow N Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

Name: Wary Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Wary Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Wary Fighter 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Weaving Fighter
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack by X% (if foe can make a follow-up attack, X = 80; otherwise, X = 40), and reduces damage from foe's follow-up attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes; likewise, "follow-up attack" normally means the second strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the third and fourth strikes), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Canny Fighter
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack, reduces damage from foe's first attack by X% (if foe can make a follow-up attack, X = 80; otherwise, X = 40), and reduces damage from foe's follow-up attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes; likewise, "follow-up attack" normally means the second strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the third and fourth strikes), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Bold Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Bold Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Bold Fighter 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Assault Fighter
Description: If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X9%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Vengeful Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Vengeful Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Vengeful Fighter 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

Name: Vengeful Fighter 4
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, inflicts Atk-4 on foe during combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, foe cannot make a follow-up attack, and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: Special Fighter 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Special Fighter 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Special Fighter 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Special Fighter 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 40%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack), reduces the effect of【Deep Wounds】by 50% during combat, and also, if unit deals damage to foe using a Special, restores HP = 30% of damage dealt (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Scowling Fighter
Description: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown).

Name: Odd Follow-Up 1
Description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Odd Follow-Up 2
Description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Odd Follow-Up 3
Description: If it is an odd-numbered turn, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Even Follow-Up 1
Description: If it is an even-numbered turn and unit's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Even Follow-Up 2
Description: If it is an even-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Even Follow-Up 3
Description: If it is an even-numbered turn, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Daring Fighter 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 40% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

Name: Daring Fighter 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 60% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

Name: Daring Fighter 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

Name: Crafty Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Crafty Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Crafty Fighter 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Slick Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Slick Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Slick Fighter 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Slick Fighter 4
Description: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk-5 on foe, deals +X damage (X = 20% of unit's Def; excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by X (excluding area-of-effect Specials), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, an

Name: Hardy Fighter 1
Description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks during combat. At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special and Special has the "reduces damage by X%" effect, Special triggers twice. (Example: if Special has the "reduces damage by 50%" effect and no other damage reduction effects trigger, reduces initial damage by 50%, then reduces remaining damage by 50% for a total damage reduction of 75%.) Each Special trigger is calculated as a separate activation.

Name: Hardy Fighter 2
Description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks during combat. At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special and Special has the "reduces damage by X%" effect, Special triggers twice, then reduces damage by 5. (Example: if Special has the "reduces damage by 50%" effect and no other damage reduction effects trigger, reduces initial damage by 50%, then reduces remaining damage by 50% for a total damage reduction of 75%. Remaining damage is then reduced further by 5.) Each Special trigger is calculated as a separate activation.

Name: Hardy Fighter 3
Description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks during combat. At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special and Special has the "reduces damage by X%" effect, Special triggers twice, then reduces damage by 5. (Example: if Special has the "reduces damage by 50%" effect and no other damage reduction effects trigger, reduces initial damage by 50%, then reduces remaining damage by 50% for a total damage reduction of 75%. Remaining damage is then reduced further by 5.) Each Special trigger is calculated as a separate activation.

Name: Shield Fighter
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe during combat. If foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, triggers the following effects during combat: grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first attack; if foe's first attack triggers the "attacks twice" effect, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's second strike as well; grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first follow-up attack. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special and Special has the "reduces damage by X%" effect, Special triggers twice, then reduces damage by 7. Each Special trigger is calculated as a separate activation.

Name: Savvy Fighter 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 10%.

Name: Savvy Fighter 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd-2, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 20%.

Name: Savvy Fighter 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd-4, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

Name: Savvy Fighter 4
Description: If foe initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

Name: Clever Fighter
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, and increases the Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by 10 during combat (for example, if Spd difference necessary increases by 10, Spd must be ≥ 15 more than foe's Spd to make a follow-up attack; stacks with similar skills), and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

Name: Wily Fighter 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) on foe during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Wily Fighter 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) on foe during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Wily Fighter 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) on foe during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Wily Fighter 4
Description: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk-5 on foe, deals +X damage (X = 20% of unit's Def; excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by X (excluding area-of-effect Specials), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and neutralizes foe's bonuses during combat.

Name: Beast Agility 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+13, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Beast Agility 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+7, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Beast Agility 3
Description: Removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Beast Agility 4
Description: Removes the condition to transform. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and unit deals damage = 10% of unit's Spd (excluding when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special).

Name: Bestial Agility
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1; Min 2)] while transformed. If unit is transformed or unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe and deals damage = 20% of the greater of unit's Spd or Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and also, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Bestial Assault
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1; Min 2)] while transformed. If unit is transformed or unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, deals damage = 20% of the greater of unit's Spd or Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Beast N Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. If unit's HP = 100%, removes the condition to transform.

Name: Beast N Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. If unit's HP ≥ 50%, removes the condition to transform.

Name: Beast N Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. Removes the condition to transform.

Name: Beast Follow-Up 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, removes the condition to transform. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

Name: Beast Follow-Up 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, removes the condition to transform. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

Name: Beast Follow-Up 3
Description: Removes the condition to transform. Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

Name: Beast Sense 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by X% (X = difference between Spd stats; max 10).

Name: Beast Sense 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by X% (X = difference between Spd stats × 2; max 20).

Name: Beast Sense 3
Description: Removes the condition to transform. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by X% (X = difference between Spd stats × 3; max 30).

Name: Beast Sense 4
Description: Removes the condition to transform. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +7. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by X% (X = difference between Spd stats × 4; max 40).

Name: Beast Assault 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, removes the condition to transform. Reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 20% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Beast Assault 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, removes the condition to transform. Reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 30% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Beast Assault 3
Description: Removes the condition to transform. Reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 40% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Beast Assault 4
Description: Removes the condition to transform. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Dragon's Wrath 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 10% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

Name: Dragon's Wrath 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 15% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 15% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

Name: Dragon's Wrath 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 20% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 20% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

Name: Dragon's Wrath 4
Description: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 25%. If unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

Name: Edged Scales
Description: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe, deals damage = 15% of foe's Atk (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and increases the Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by 10 during combat, and also, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Dragon's Ire 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Dragon's Ire 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Dragon's Ire 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Dragon's Ire 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and also, if foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

Name: Dragon's Scales
Description: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def/Res-X on foe (X = 4 + the greater of the difference between Def stats or difference between Res stats (unit's Def/Res minus foe's Def/Res); max 11; if either of unit's stats < foe's stat, difference is treated as 0), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Dragon Wall 1
Description: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%).

Name: Dragon Wall 2
Description: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%).

Name: Dragon Wall 3
Description: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

Name: High Dragon Wall
Description: If a skill compares unit's Res to a foe's or ally's Res, treats unit's Res as if granted +5. Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat. If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). Foes with Range = 2 cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains).

Name: Counter Roar 1
Description: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 10% and unit's next attack deals damage = 10% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: Counter Roar 2
Description: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 20% and unit's next attack deals damage = 20% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: Counter Roar 3
Description: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30% and unit's next attack deals damage = 30% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: Counter Roar 4
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30% (for standard attacks, "first attack" means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 30% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Spd 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Spd 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Spd 3
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Def 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Def 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Def 3
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Def 4
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-X on foe (X = 4 + number of [Bonus] effects active on foe; max 8; excludes stat bonuses) and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Res 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Res 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Atk/Res 3
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Def 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Def 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Def 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Def 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-X on foe (X = 4 + number of [Bonus] effects active on foe; max 8; excludes stat bonuses) and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Res 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Res 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Res 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Lull Spd/Res 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-X on foe (X = 4 + number of [Bonus] effects active on foe; max 8; excludes stat bonuses) and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Seal Atk 1
Description: Inflicts Atk-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk 2
Description: Inflicts Atk-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk 3
Description: Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk 4
Description: Inflicts Atk-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Atk, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Atk (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Atk, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd 1
Description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd 2
Description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd 3
Description: Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd 4
Description: Inflicts Spd-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Spd, inflicts penalty on foe's Spd during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Spd (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Spd, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def 1
Description: Inflicts Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def 2
Description: Inflicts Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def 3
Description: Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def 4
Description: Inflicts Def-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Def, inflicts penalty on foe's Def during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Def (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Def, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Res 1
Description: Inflicts Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Res 2
Description: Inflicts Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Res 3
Description: Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Res 4
Description: Inflicts Res-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Res, inflicts penalty on foe's Res during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Res (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Spd 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Spd 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Def 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Def 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Res 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Res 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk/Res 3
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Atk/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Atk or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

Name: Seal Spd/Def 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd/Def 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd/Def 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Spd/Def = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Spd or Def, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on foe through its next action.

Name: Seal Spd/Res 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd/Res 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Spd/Res 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Spd/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Spd or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

Name: Seal Def/Res 1
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def/Res 2
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Def/Res 3
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Def/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Def or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

Name: Chill Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

Name: Chill Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

Name: Chill Def 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

Name: Chill Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

Name: Chill Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

Name: Chill Res 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Spd 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Spd 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Atk/Res 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total and foes within 2 spaces of that foe through their next actions.

Name: Chill Spd/Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd/Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Spd/Res 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on foes on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

Name: Chill Def/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Def/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def+Res total through its next action.

Name: Chill Def/Res 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-6 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def+Res total and foes within 2 spaces of that foe through their next actions.

Name: Odd Pulse Tie 1
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Odd Pulse Tie 2
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Odd Pulse Tie 3
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Even Pulse Tie 1
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Even Pulse Tie 2
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Even Pulse Tie 3
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

Name: Sabotage Atk 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-3 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Atk 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-5 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Atk 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-7 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Spd 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-3 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Spd 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Spd 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-7 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Def 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-3 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Def 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-5 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Def 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-7 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Res 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-3 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Res 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-5 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage Res 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-7 on that foe through its next action.

Name: Sabotage A/D 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res < unit's Res and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on that foe through its next action. At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res, inflicts Atk/Def-X on foe during combat (X = 3 + highest penalty on each stat between target and foes within 2 spaces of target; calculates each stat penalty independently).

Name: Sabotage A/R 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res < unit's Res and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on that foe through its next action. At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res, inflicts Atk/Res-X on foe during combat (X = 3 + highest penalty on each stat between target and foes within 2 spaces of target; calculates each stat penalty independently).

Name: Sabotage S/R 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res < unit's Res and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on that foe through its next action. At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res, inflicts Spd/Res-X on foe during combat (X = 3 + highest penalty on each stat between target and foes within 2 spaces of target; calculates each stat penalty independently).

Name: Atk/Res Discord
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Atk/Res-6 and [Discord] on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions. Inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with [Discord] within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Spd/Res Discord
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Spd/Res-6 and [Discord] on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions. Inflicts penalty on foe's Spd/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with [Discord] within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Def/Res Discord
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Def/Res-6 and [Discord] on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions. Inflicts penalty on foe's Def/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with [Discord] within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Atk/Res Havoc
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Atk/Res-7, [Sabotage], and [Schism] on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions. After start-of-turn skills trigger on unit's player phase, if the number of foes with the [Sabotage] effect active on the map ≥ 2, grants [Canto (1)] to unit for 1 turn. Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe and deals damage = 20% of unit's Res during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Sudden Panic 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-5 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts  [Panic] on that foe.

Name: Sudden Panic 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts  [Panic] on that foe.

Name: Sudden Panic 3
Description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts  [Panic] on that foe.

Name: Atk/Spd Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Spd Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Spd Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Spd Link 4
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 and [Canto (1)] to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn. Inflicts Spd-4 and Def/Res-2 on foe and unit deals +X damage during combat (X = highest total Atk+Spd bonuses among unit and allies with [Canto (1)] active; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Atk/Def Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Def Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Def Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Res Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Res Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Res Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Def Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Def Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Def Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Def Link 4
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 and [Canto (1)] to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn. Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and unit deals +X damage during combat (X = highest total Spd+Def bonuses among unit and allies with [Canto (1)] active; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Spd/Res Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Res Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Spd/Res Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Def/Res Link 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Def/Res Link 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Def/Res Link 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Name: Atk/Spd Snag 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Spd Snag 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Spd Snag 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Def Snag 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Def Snag 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Def Snag 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Def Snag 4
Description: Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-7 and [Sabotage] on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target ally after movement and on foes within 2 spaces of those foes equipped with a skill that can trigger the Savior effect through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Snag 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Snag 2
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Snag 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Detect
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts [Exposure] on closest foes within 5 spaces of both unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally after movement and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions. Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foes on the map with the [Exposure] effect active and neutralizes bonuses to Spd/Def for those foes during combat.

Name: Spd/Def Snag 1
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

Name: Spd/Def Snag 3
Description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and targeted ally through their next action.

Name: Spd/Def Snag 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-7 and [Sabotage] on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target ally after movement and on foes within 2 spaces of those foes equipped with a skill that can trigger the Savior effect through their next actions.

Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. Name: Swordbreaker 1

Name: Pass 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 75%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

Name: Pass 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

Name: Pass 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

Name: Obstruct 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Name: Obstruct 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Name: Obstruct 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 1
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 2
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 3
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: A/S Bulwark 4
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: A/S Spiked Wall
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Atk/Def Bulwark 1
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Def Bulwark 2
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Def Bulwark 3
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: A/D Bulwark 4
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: A/D Spiked Wall
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Lunge
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit and target foe swap spaces after combat.

Name: Knock Back
Description: If unit initiates combat, target foe moves 1 space away after combat.

Name: Drag Back
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat. Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

Name: Hit and Run
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

Name: Escape Route 1
Description: If unit’s HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

Name: Escape Route 2
Description: If unit’s HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

Name: Escape Route 3
Description: If unit’s HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

Name: Escape Route 4
Description: When unit's HP ≤ 99%, enables [Canto (1)] (also activates if conditions are met due to effects after combat). Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 99%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 3 spaces. If unit's HP ≤ 60%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

Name: Wings of Mercy 1
Description: If an ally's HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

Name: Wings of Mercy 2
Description: If an ally's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

Name: Wings of Mercy 3
Description: If an ally's HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

Name: Wings of Mercy 4
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe during combat. If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally and that ally's HP ≤ 99%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally. If an ally's HP ≤ 60%, unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of that ally.

Name: Flier Formation 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

Name: Flier Formation 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

Name: Flier Formation 3
Description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

Name: Aerobatics 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

Name: Aerobatics 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

Name: Aerobatics 3
Description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

Name: A/R Near Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe during combat.

Name: A/R Near Trace 4
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1; Min 2)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat and unit deals +7 damage including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat.

Name: S/D Near Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe during combat.

Name: S/D Near Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe during combat.

Description: Enables [Canto (Rem. +1)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe during combat.

Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe during combat.

Name: A/D Far Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe during combat.

Name: A/D Far Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe during combat.

Name: A/D Far Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe during combat.

Name: A/R Far Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe during combat.

Name: A/R Far Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe during combat.

Name: A/R Far Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe during combat.

Name: A/R Far Trace 4
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.; Min 1)]. Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat and unit deals +7 damage, including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat.

Name: A/R Far Resound
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.; Min 1)]. Deals damage to unit as combat begins = 20% of X (X = unit's max HP before entering battle - 20; "max HP before entering battle" means unit's max HP excluding HP increases from Legendary Effects, Mythic Effects, Bonus Heroes, etc.; activates only when unit can attack in combat; effects that reduce damage "during combat" do not apply; will not reduce unit's HP below 1). Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, unit deals damage = unit's HP at start of combat - current HP, × 2 (max 12, min 6; excluding area-of-effect Specials) and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by percentage = unit's HP at start of combat - current HP, × 10 during combat (max 60%, min 30%; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: S/D Far Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe during combat.

Name: S/D Far Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe during combat.

Name: S/D Far Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe during combat.

Name: S/D Far Trace 4
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.; Min 1)]. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat and unit deals +7 damage including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat.

Name: S/R Far Trace 1
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe during combat.

Name: S/R Far Trace 2
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe during combat.

Name: S/R Far Trace 3
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.)]. Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe during combat.

Name: S/R Far Trace 4
Description: Enables [Canto (Rem.; Min 1)]. Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat and unit deals +7 damage including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat.

Name: Dull Ranged 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Dull Ranged 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Dull Ranged 3
Description: If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Dull Close 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Dull Close 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Dull Close 3
Description: If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Flow Refresh 1
Description: At the start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Flow Refresh 2
Description: At the start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Flow Refresh 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores 10 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Flow Refresh 4
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 40%, and restores 10 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Flow Guard 1
Description: At the start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Flow Guard 2
Description: At the start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Flow Guard 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Flow Guard 4
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

Name: Atk/Res Tempo 1
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Atk/Res Tempo 2
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Atk/Res Tempo 3
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Atk/Res Tempo 4
Description: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

Name: Spd/Def Tempo 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Def Tempo 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Def Tempo 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Def Tempo 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

Name: Spd/Res Tempo 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Tempo 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Tempo 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Tempo 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

Name: Renewal 1
Description: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 2
Description: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 3
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, restores 10 HP.

Name: Guard 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Guard 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Guard 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 80%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Guard 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk-4 and Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack) and reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

Name: Reopening
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk-5 on foe, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack), deals damage = X% of unit's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's attacks by X% of unit's Def during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials; if unit can make a follow-up attack or if unit triggers the "unit attacks twice" effect, X = 10; otherwise, X = 20).

Name: Cancel Affinity 1
Description: Neutralizes all weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's and foe's skills.

Name: Cancel Affinity 2
Description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

Name: Cancel Affinity 3
Description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reverses weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

Name: Shield Pulse 1
Description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1.

Name: Shield Pulse 2
Description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

Name: Shield Pulse 3
Description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

Name: Buffer 4
Description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +7. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 5 (max 50%).

Name: Wrath 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

Name: Wrath 2
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

Name: Wrath 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

Name: Poison Strike 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 4 damage to foe after combat.

Name: Poison Strike 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

Name: Poison Strike 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

Name: Assassin's Strike
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe as combat begins (effects that reduce damage during combat do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1), inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and deals damage = 20% of foe's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Occultist's Strike
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe as combat begins (effects that reduce damage during combat do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1), inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat, and deals damage = 20% of foe's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Live for Honor
Description: If unit survives, get 1.5x badges from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. This skill has no effect in this application.)

Name: Live for Bounty
Description: If unit survives, get 1.5x shards/crystals from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. This skill has no effect in this application.)

Name: Disarm Trap 1
Description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 1, cancels trap's effect.

Name: Disarm Trap 2
Description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 3, cancels trap's effect.

Name: Disarm Trap 3
Description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect.

Name: Disarm Trap 4
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and if unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect; if unit ends movement on a space with a Hex Trap, reduces trap's trigger condition by 10 HP.

Name: Potent Disarm
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If decreasing the Spd difference necessary to make a follow-up attack by 25 would allow unit to trigger a follow-up attack (excluding guaranteed or prevented follow-ups), triggers [Potent Follow X%] during combat (if unit cannot perform follow-up and attack twice, X = 80; otherwise, X = 40). While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect; if unit ends movement on a space with a Hex Trap, reduces trap's trigger condition by 10 HP.

Name: Full Disarm
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-X on foe (X = total number of [Bonus] effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, and [Penalty] effects active on foe, excluding stat penalties, × 2, + 4; max 12), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.
