At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an armored ally or an infantry ally with Range = 1, grants "unit can move 1 extra space" to unit, infantry allies with Range = 1 within 2 spaces of unit, and armored allies within 2 spaces of unit. (That turn only; does not stack; effect triggers only if unit has no Sing or Dance skill.)

Name: Spd/Def Crux
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: S/D Hold Guide
Description: Allies within 2 spaces of unit can move to any space within 2 spaces of unit. Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally within 2 spaces. Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 3 spaces of unit during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Rein 1
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Rein 2
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Rein 3
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Spd/Res Hold

Name: Spd/Res Crux
Description: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

Description: Inflicts Def/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Def/Res Rein 2
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Def/Res Rein 3
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

Name: Def/Res Hold
Description: Inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

Name: Threaten Atk 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Atk 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Atk 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Spd 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Spd 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Spd 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Def 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Beast Threaten
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 and [Panic] on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit through their next actions. At start of turn, if any foe is within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, grants Atk+6 to unit for 1 turn, and also, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit.

Name: Threaten Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threaten Res 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Spd 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Spd 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Spd 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit for 1 turn and inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Spd Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on closest foes through their next actions and grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Threat. Atk/Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Def 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a foe, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn and inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Def Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Atk/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Threat. Atk/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Atk/Res 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a foe, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn and inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Atk/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Threat. Spd/Def 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Spd/Def 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Spd/Def Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Spd/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Threat. Spd/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Spd/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Name: Spd/Res Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Spd/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Threat. Def/Res 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces of unit through their next actions.

Name: Threat. Def/Res 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces of unit through their next actions.

Name: Def/Res Menace
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Def/Res-6 on closest foes through their next actions and grants Def/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Savage Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 3 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Name: Savage Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 5 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Name: Savage Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Name: Deadly Miasma
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat, and after combat, deals 7 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and applies [Divine Vein (Haze)] on target's space and on each space within 2 spaces of target's space for 1 turn.

Name: Breath of Life 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, restores 3 HP to adjacent allies after combat.

Name: Breath of Life 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, restores 5 HP to adjacent allies after combat.

Name: Breath of Life 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, restores 7 HP to adjacent allies after combat.

Name: Breath of Life 4
Description: For allies within 2 spaces of unit, restores X HP to that ally as their combat begins (triggers after effects that deal damage as combat begins; if ally's Def > foe's Def, X = 20% of ally's max HP + difference between stats × 4; otherwise, X = 20% of ally's max HP; max 40% of ally's max HP + damage dealt to ally as combat begins; only highest value applied; does not stack). For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Def+4 and reduces the effect of [Deep Wounds] by 50% during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, restores X HP to unit as unit's combat begins (triggers after effects that deal damage as combat begins; if unit's Def > foe's Def, X = 20% of unit's max HP + difference between stats × 4; otherwise, X = 20% of unit's max HP; max 40% of unit's max HP + damage dealt to unit as combat begins; only highest value applied; does not stack). If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def+4 to unit and reduces the effect of [Deep Wounds] by 50% during combat.

Name: Atk Smoke 1
Description: Inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Atk Smoke 2
Description: Inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Atk Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts Atk-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Atk Smoke 4
Description: After combat, inflicts Atk-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, grants Def/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn, and unit gains "foe cannot make a follow-up attack" for 1 turn.

Name: Spd Smoke 1
Description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Spd Smoke 2
Description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Spd Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts Spd-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Spd Smoke 4
Description: After combat, inflicts Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, and grants Spd+6 and [Dodge] to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Def Smoke 1
Description: Inflicts Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Def Smoke 2
Description: Inflicts Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Def Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts Def-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Res Smoke 1
Description: Inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Res Smoke 2
Description: Inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Res Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts Res-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Name: Def/Res Smoke 3
Description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, grants Atk+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn, and grants [Pathfinder] to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Pulse Smoke 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on target and foes within 1 space of target after combat. (No effect on Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)

Name: Pulse Smoke 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat. (No effect on Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)

Name: Pulse Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat. (No effect on Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)

Name: Pulse Smog
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Atk-7 and [Guard] on target and foes within 3 spaces of target through their next actions and inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on those foes (cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown). If unit initiates combat and foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

Name: Panic Smoke 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts [Panic] on target and foes within 1 space of target after combat.

Name: Panic Smoke 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts [Panic] on target and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Name: Panic Smoke 3
Description: Inflicts [Panic] on target and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Name: Panic Smoke 4
Description: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-3 and [Panic] on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, and grants [Foe Penalty Doubler] to unit and allies in cardinal directions.

Name: Fatal Smoke 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover HP during or after combat, and after combat, inflicts [Deep Wounds] on target and foes within 1 space of target.

Name: Fatal Smoke 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, foe cannot recover HP during or after combat, and after combat, inflicts [Deep Wounds] on target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

Name: Fatal Smoke 3
Description: Foe cannot recover HP during or after combat, and after combat, inflicts [Deep Wounds] on target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

Name: Fatal Smoke 4
Description: Foe cannot recover HP during or after combat. Neutralizes foe's non-Special "if foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP" effects during combat. After combat, inflicts [Deep Wounds] and a penalty that neutralizes non-Special "if foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP" effects on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Name: Atk Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Atk Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Atk Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Spd Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Spd Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Spd Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Def Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Def Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Def Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Res Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Res Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Res Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Spd Ploy 3
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Atk/Spd-7, [Ploy], and [Exposure] on those foes through their next actions.

Name: Atk/Res Ploy 3
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Atk/Res-7, [Ploy], and [Exposure] on those foes through their next actions.

Name: Spd/Res Ploy 3
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Spd/Res-7, [Ploy], and [Exposure] on those foes through their next actions.

Name: Def/Res Ploy 3
Description: At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Def/Res-7, [Ploy], and [Exposure] on those foes through their next actions.

Name: Panic Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-5 into penalties through their next actions.

Name: Panic Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-3 into penalties through their next actions.

Name: Panic Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP < unit's HP into penalties through their next actions.

Name: Stall Ploy 1
Description: At start of turn, inflicts [Stall] on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-5.

Name: Stall Ploy 2
Description: At start of turn, inflicts [Stall] on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-3.

Name: Stall Ploy 3
Description: At start of turn, inflicts [Stall] on foes in cardinal directions with HP < unit's HP.

Name: Close Guard 1
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+2 during combat."

Name: Close Guard 2
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+3 during combat."

Name: Close Guard 3
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 during combat."

Name: Joint Close Guard
Description: Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces during combat against sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

Name: Lower Ground
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot warp into spaces within 3 spaces of unit and foes with Range = 2 cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit (in either case, does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains). If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 1, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

Name: Distant Guard 1
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat."

Name: Distant Guard 2
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+3 during combat."

Name: Distant Guard 3
Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat."

Name: Joint Dist. Guard
Description: Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces during combat against bow, dagger, magic, or staff foes. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

Name: Barricade
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot warp into spaces within 3 spaces of unit and foes with Range = 2 cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit (in either case, does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains). Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 3 spaces of unit and neutralizes their penalties to Def/Res during their combat. If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+4 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Def/Res during combat.

Name: Higher Ground
Description: Foes with Range = 1 cannot warp into spaces within 3 spaces of unit and foes with Range = 2 cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains). If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 2, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

Name: Red Feud 1
Description: If in combat against a red foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat. During combat, disables skills of all red foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Red Feud 2
Description: If in combat against a red foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all red foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Red Feud 3
Description: If in combat against a red foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all red foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Blue Feud 1
Description: During combat, disables skills of all blue foes, excluding foe in combat. If in combat against a blue foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Blue Feud 2
Description: During combat, disables skills of all blue foes, excluding foe in combat. If in combat against a blue foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat.

Name: Blue Feud 3
Description: During combat, disables skills of all blue foes, excluding foe in combat. If in combat against a blue foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat.

Name: Green Feud 1
Description: If in combat against a green foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat. During combat, disables skills of all green foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Green Feud 2
Description: If in combat against a green foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all green foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Green Feud 3
Description: If in combat against a green foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all green foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: C Feud 1
Description: If in combat against a colorless foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat. During combat, disables skills of all colorless foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: C Feud 2
Description: If in combat against a colorless foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all colorless foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: C Feud 3
Description: If in combat against a colorless foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat. During combat, disables skills of all colorless foes, excluding foe in combat.

Name: Preempt Screech
Description: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, disables skills of all foes, excluding foe in combat, and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

Name: Infantry Pulse 1
Description: At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown count-1 to all infantry allies on team with HP ≤ unit’s HP-5.

Name: Infantry Pulse 2
Description: At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown count-1 to all infantry allies on team with HP ≤ unit’s HP-3.

Name: Infantry Pulse 3
Description: At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown count-1 to all infantry allies on team with HP < unit’s HP.

Name: Infantry Pulse 4
Description: At start of turn, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit. At start of turn, if any infantry ally's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value and that ally's max HP < unit's max HP, grants Special cooldown count-1 to that ally. (Stacks with similar skills.)

Name: Infantry Rush 1
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Rush 2
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Rush 3
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Flash 1
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Flash 2
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Flash 3
Description: Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Breath 1
Description: Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Breath 2
Description: Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+1 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Infantry Breath 3
Description: Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

Name: Time's Pulse 1
Description: At the start of every third turn, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1.

Name: Time's Pulse 2
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1.

Name: Time's Pulse 3
Description: At start of turn, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1.

Name: Time's Pulse 4
Description: At start of turn, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1. After combat, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1.

Name: Time Pulse Edge
Description: At start of turn, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit. Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = unit's maximum Special cooldown count value + 2, and also, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit.

Name: Time Pulse Helm
Description: At start of turn, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit. Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Res during combat = unit's maximum Special cooldown count value + 2, and also, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit.

Name: Pulse Up: Blades
Description: At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit for 1 turn (X = turn number × 2; max 6) and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit.

Name: Pulse Up: Ploy
Description: At start of turn, grants Special cooldown count-1. At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts [Ploy] and [Exposure] on those foes through their next actions.

Name: Creation Pulse
Description: If [Penalty] is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+3 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-X to unit before unit's first attack during combat (X = number of 【Penalty】effects active on foe, excluding stat penalties; max 2).

Name: Pulse On: Blades
Description: Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd = unit's max Special cooldown count value + 2, and if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2 to unit before unit's first follow-up attack during combat.

Name: Armor March 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Armor March 2
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Armor March 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Armored Stride 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Armored Stride 2
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Armored Stride 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Assault Troop 1
Description: At start of turn, if any foe is in cardinal directions of unit, grants [Charge] to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Assault Troop 2
Description: At start of turn, if any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants [Charge] to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Assault Troop 3
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% or any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants [Charge] to unit for 1 turn.

Name: Assault Rush
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% or any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants Atk+6, "unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only, does not stack)," and [Charge] to unit for 1 turn. If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+5 to unit and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

Name: Guidance 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Guidance 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Guidance 3
Description: Infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Guidance 4
Description: Infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space within 2 spaces of unit. Grants Atk/Spd+3 to infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat, and also, if those allies' Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that prevent those allies' follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Flier Guidance 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Flier Guidance 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Flier Guidance 3
Description: Flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

Name: Soaring Guidance
Description: Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces of unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of unit. Grants Atk/Spd+3 to infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat, and also, if those allies' Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that prevent those allies' follow-up attacks during combat.

Name: Air Orders 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, grants the following status to adjacent flying allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Air Orders 2
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants the following status to adjacent flying allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Air Orders 3
Description: At start of turn, grants the following status to adjacent flying allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Air Orders 4
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6, [Charge], and the following status to unit and flying allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn: "unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Ground Orders 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, grants the following status to adjacent infantry, armored, and cavalry allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Ground Orders 2
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants the following status to adjacent infantry, armored, and cavalry allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Ground Orders 3
Description: At start of turn, grants the following status to adjacent infantry, armored, and cavalry allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

Name: Odd Tempest 1
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if unit's HP = 100%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Odd Tempest 2
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Odd Tempest 3
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Even Tempest 1
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, if unit's HP = 100%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Even Tempest 2
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Even Tempest 3
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Name: Endless Tempest
Description: At start of turn, unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only; does not stack). If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat (max 3) and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Brutal Tempest
Description: Enables [Canto (Dist. +1; Max 4)]. At start of turn, unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only; does not stack). Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat (max 3).

Name: Canto Control 1
Description: If foe within 2 spaces of unit triggers Canto, inflicts [Canto Control] on that foe.

Name: Canto Control 2
Description: If foe within 3 spaces of unit triggers Canto, inflicts [Canto Control] on that foe.

Name: Canto Control 3
Description: If foe within 4 spaces of unit triggers Canto, inflicts [Canto Control] on that foe.

Name: Firm Canto Curb
Description: If foe within 4 spaces of this unit triggers Canto, inflicts [Canto Control] on that foe. Prevents "after start-of-turn skills trigger, action ends immediately" status effects from being inflicted on unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit. For unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit, neutralizes effects that would end their action as a result of foe's skills or the "after start-of-turn skills trigger, action ends immediately" status (does not neutralize effects from Aether Raid structures or the special slot).

Name: Inf. Null Follow 1
Description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants  [Null Follow-Up] to adjacent infantry allies.

Name: Inf. Null Follow 2
Description: At start of turn, grants [Null Follow-Up] to adjacent infantry allies.

Name: Inf. Null Follow 3
Description: At start of turn, grants [Null Follow-Up] to infantry allies within 2 spaces of unit.

Name: Inf. Null Follow 4
Description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants [Null Follow-Up] and the following status to unit for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces." At start of turn, grants [Null Follow-Up] to infantry allies within 2 spaces of unit.

Name: Odd Recovery 1
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 5 HP to those units.

Name: Odd Recovery 2
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 10 HP to those units.

Name: Odd Recovery 3
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 20 HP to those units.

Name: Even Recovery 1
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 5 HP to those units.

Name: Even Recovery 2
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 10 HP to those units.

Name: Even Recovery 3
Description: At start of even-numbered turns, neutralizes any [Penalty] on allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and restores 20 HP to those units.

Name: A/S Near Save 1
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+1 during combat.

Name: A/S Near Save 2
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

Name: A/S Near Save 3
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

Name: A/D Near Save 1
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+1 during combat.

Name: A/D Near Save 2
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

Name: A/D Near Save 3
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

Name: A/D Twin N Save
Description: If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 1, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

Name: A/R Near Save 1
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+1 during combat.

Name: A/R Near Save 2
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

Name: A/R Near Save 3
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

Name: A/R Twin N Save
Description: If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 1, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

Name: D/R Near Save 1
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1 during combat.

Name: D/R Near Save 2
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

Name: D/R Near Save 3
Description: If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

Name: D/R Twin N Save
Description: If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 1, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

Name: A/S Far Save 1
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+1 during combat.

Name: A/S Far Save 2
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

Name: A/S Far Save 3
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

Name: A/D Far Save 1
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+1 during combat.

Name: A/D Far Save 2
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

Name: A/D Far Save 3
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

Name: A/D Twin F Save
Description: If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 2, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

Name: A/D Briar F Save
Description: If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 2, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 5 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 40% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: A/R Far Save 1
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+1 during combat.

Name: A/R Far Save 2
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

Name: A/R Far Save 3
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

Name: A/R Twin F Save
Description: If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If foe's Range = 2, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

Name: D/R Far Save 1
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1 during combat.

Name: D/R Far Save 2
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

Name: D/R Far Save 3
Description: If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers [Savior] on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

Name: Shadow Shift 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Reposition] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Shift 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Reposition] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Shift 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Reposition] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Shift 4
Description: When Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Reposition] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger). If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to unit during combat and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Shadow Smite 1
Description: If unit's HP = 100%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Smite] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Smite 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Smite] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Smite 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 25%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Smite] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Shadow Smite 4
Description: When Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Smite] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger). If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to unit during combat and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Name: Lookout 1
Description: Enables [Canto (1)]. If unit's HP = 100%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Distant Swap] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Lookout 2
Description: Enables [Canto (1)]. If unit's HP ≥ 50%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Distant Swap] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Lookout 3
Description: Enables [Canto (1)]. If unit's HP ≥ 25%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Distant Swap] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

Name: Lookout Force
Description: Enables [Canto (2)]. When Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Distant Swap] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger). If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

Name: Active Lookout
Description: Enables [Canto (2)]. When Canto triggers, enables unit to use [Distant Swap] on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger). If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit during combat. If unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe's next attack.

Description: While unit lives and uses a sword, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. This skill has no effect in this application.)

Name: Sword Exp. 2
Description: While unit lives, all sword allies on team get 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. This skill has no effect in this application.)

Name: Staff Valor 2
